# The New Zealand Soil Classification {#sec-nzsc123}

Classifying a profile according to the first three levels of the NZSC [@hewitt2024] requires the following steps:

1.  Identify diagnostic features
2.  Follow the Key to Soil Orders
3.  Follow the Keys to Group and Subgroup.

To extend the classification to levels 4 and 5, the profile form must be identified, key features summarised, and a functional horizon sequence assigned [@webb2011]. This section highlights the elements of the *Soil Description Handbook* that may be required to complete these tasks.

## Identifying Diagnostic features {#sec-in-nzscdiags}

## Completing the classification to Subgroup level {#sec-in-nzsc23}

At the Group and Subgroup levels of the classification, requirements become more uniform. For example, the majority of Orders need pH data to identify acidic subgroups. Additional requirements are listed in @tbl-nzsc-gsg below.

+------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Order            | Requirement                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+:=================+:======================================================================================================================================================================================================+
| Organic Soils    | -   Texture: Organic matter [decomposition state](hr_03_texture.qmd#sec-tex-orgmod)                                                                                                                   |
|                  | -   Field test: [pH](hr_06_chemical_properties.html#sec-ft-phf)                                                                                                                                       |
+------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Gley Soils       | -   Texture: [Texture group](hr_03_texture.qmd#sec-hr-eatxt)                                                                                                                                          |
|                  | -   Architecture: [Structure](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-hr-stru), [rock fragment content](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-rockfrag)                                                                       |
|                  | -   Secondary features: [Concentrations](hr_04_secondary_features.qmd#sec-hr-conc), [coatings](hr_04_secondary_features.qmd#sec-hr-coat)                                                              |
|                  | -   Consistence: [Stickiness](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-cn-sti)                                                                                                                               |
|                  | -   Field test: [pH](hr_06_chemical_properties.html#sec-ft-phf)                                                                                                                                       |
|                  | -   [Buried horizons](in_01_horizon_names.html#sec-hzn-bur)                                                                                                                                           |
+------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Ultic Soils      | -   Architecture: [Rock fragment content](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-rockfrag) and [lithology](ss_04_parent_material.qmd#sec-pm-lith)                                                                 |
|                  | -   [Matrix colour](hr_02_colour.qmd#sec-col-matrix)                                                                                                                                                  |
|                  | -   Secondary features: [Coatings](hr_04_secondary_features.qmd#sec-hr-coat)                                                                                                                          |
|                  | -   Field test: [pH](hr_06_chemical_properties.html#sec-ft-phf)                                                                                                                                       |
|                  | -   Laboratory data: Exchangeable cations                                                                                                                                                             |

| Podzol Soils     | -   Architecture: [Structure](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-hr-stru)                                                                                                                                     |

|                  | -   Consistence: [Unconfined strength](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-cn-stru), [penetration resistance](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-cn-pres)                                                |

## Completing the classification to Sibling level {#sec-in-nzscfamsib}

Detailed requirements for classifying the Family and Sibling are contained in @webb2011.

### Family requirements {#sec-in-nzscfam}

+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Parameter                               | Requirements                                                                                                               |
+:========================================+:===========================================================================================================================+
| Soil Profile Material                   | -   [Rock fragment content](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-rockfrag) (either texture code or percentage estimate)              |
|                                         | -   [Rock fragment roundedness](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-rockfrag-shp)                                                   |
|                                         | -   Depth to [regolithic or saprolithic material](pr_02_layers.qmd#sec-pr-wdeg), if encountered                            |
|                                         | -   Depth to lithic or paralithic contact, if encountered                                                                  |
|                                         | -   Thickness of organic soil material, if encountered                                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Rock class of profile stone and bedrock | -   [Lithology](ss_04_parent_material.qmd#sec-pm-lith) of rock fragments (if encountered)                                  |
|                                         | -   [Lithology](ss_04_parent_material.qmd#sec-pm-lith) of substrate non-soil materials (if encountered)                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Rock class of fines                     | Originating [lithology](ss_04_parent_material.qmd#sec-pm-lith) of soil materials \<2mm                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Texture group class                     | [Texture class](hr_03_texture.qmd#sec-hr-eatxt) of all horizons to 60cm depth or the limit of soil material, if shallower |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Permeability class                      | [Profile permeability](in_02_interpreted_properties.qmd#sec-in-pperm) class                                                |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

: Parameters required to identify the NZSC Family {#tbl-nzsc-famid .striped .hover tbl-colwidths="\[40, 60\]"}

### Sibling requirements {#sec-in-nzscsib}

+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Parameter                          | Requirements                                                                                                                                              |
+:===================================+:==========================================================================================================================================================+
| Soil depth (easily diggable depth) | -   [Horizon thicknesses](pr_02_layers.qmd#sec-pr-depths)                                                                                                 |
|                                    | -   [Rock fragment content](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-rockfrag) per horizon                                                                              |
|                                    | -   Secondary features: [Pans](hr_04_secondary_features.qmd#sec-pan)                                                                                      |
|                                    | -   Consistence: [Unconfined strength](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-cn-stru) under field conditions                                                  |
|                                    | -   Substrate: [Paralithic or lithic material](pr_02_layers.qmd#sec-pr-wdeg)                                                                              |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Topsoil stoniness                  | [Rock fragment content](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-rockfrag) as percentage volume within the top 20cm of the profile                                     |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Texture class                      | [Texture class](hr_03_texture.qmd#sec-hr-eatxt) of all horizons to 100cm from the soil surface or to the limit of soil material, if shallower            |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Drainage                           | [Profile drainage](in_02_interpreted_properties.qmd#sec-in-pdrng) class                                                                                   |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Rooting barriers                   | Presence of any [rooting depth restrictions](in_02_interpreted_properties.qmd#sec-in-rdpth) within 100cm of the soil surface, type and depth encountered |
+------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

: Parameters required to identify the NZSC Sibling {#tbl-nzsc-sibid .striped .hover tbl-colwidths="\[40, 60\]"}

### Functional horizon requirements {#sec-in-nzscfh}

+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Parameter         | Requirements                                                                                                                                                 |
+:==================+:=============================================================================================================================================================+
| Horizon notation  | Presence of any [A, O, or L horizons](in_01_horizon_names.qmd#sec-hzn-convp) (for identification of topsoil)                                                 |
+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Texture           | -   [Texture group](hr_03_texture.qmd#sec-hr-eatxt)                                                                                                          |
|                   | -   [Pan](hr_04_secondary_features.qmd#sec-pan) types, if present                                                                                            |
+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Firmness          | [Unconfined strength](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-cn-stru) under field conditions                                                                      |
+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Tephric materials | -   [Parent material origin](pr_02_layers.qmd#sec-pr-orig) (specifically Tephra)                                                                             |
|                   | -   Originating [lithology](ss_04_parent_material.qmd#sec-pm-lith) of soil materials \<2 mm                                                                  |
+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Stone content     | [Rock fragment content](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-rockfrag) (either from texture code or percentage estimate)                                               |
+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Structure         | -   Structure [degree of development](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-hr-stru-pedality) (where units are of pedogenic origin)                                     |
|                   | -   If horizon is pedal, ped [shape](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-hr-stru-shp) and [size](hr_01_architecture.qmd#sec-hr-stru-size)                             |
+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Consistence       | -   For [cohesive](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-dn-prep) soils, [unconfined strength](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-cn-stru) under field conditions |
|                   | -   For [non-cohesive](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-dn-prep) soils, [particle packing](hr_05_physical_properties.qmd#sec-sn-pack)                       |
+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Permeability      | [Horizon permeability](in_02_interpreted_properties.qmd#sec-in-hperm) class                                                                                  |
+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

: Parameters required to identify NZSC Functional Horizons {#tbl-nzsc-fhid .striped .hover tbl-colwidths="\[40, 60\]"}
